name: @electron-ipc/high-volume-test
description: High-volume test app for Inspector performance testing

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter electron-ipc run build && mkdirp dist && pnpm run generate:all && electron-vite dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter electron-ipc run build && mkdirp dist && pnpm run generate:all && electron-vite build
scripts.generate:all: pnpm --filter electron-ipc run build && mkdirp dist && electron-ipc-generate --config=./src/main/ipc-config.yaml
scripts.generate:watch: pnpm --filter electron-ipc run build && mkdirp dist && electron-ipc-generate --config=./src/main/ipc-config.yaml --watch
scripts.generate:check: pnpm --filter electron-ipc run build && mkdirp dist && electron-ipc-generate --config=./src/main/ipc-config.yaml --check

author: Michael Rieck (Michael--) <mr@number10.de>
